title: Best GYM near PES RR
content: I am staying in a PG near the college, wanted to know the good gyms near the college.

comments.body:
PES has a gym which is decent. There is cult Banashankari near dominoes which is also very good. Otherwise there is sparkz fitness in sutta gully but it's a very small gym and crowded , but it's the only gym I know with a monthly option.

Cult is the best one imo.
The campus gym is better than most private gyms IMO
I have heard about weird timings and also I don’t stay in the hostel. I don’t know if I will even get a slot as my classes are from 8-4
Gold's Gym near Devegowda Petrol Bunk is decent. You can go there with Cult membership

Shapes GYM is very good and it is near to college  
it is in-front of Leons. you can go whenever you want and the fee is 3500/- for 3 months  
me and my friends have joined the gym and going there since a month.
Yeah the timings and batch size are a big pain in the ass
